title: Disconnect from champion select 3 seconds after joining
body: I got in Champ select. waiting for ban. but during the first ban when timer gotto 27 second. I disconnected and the timer frozed. i lost -13 LP on my other account because of it. i tried it twice on my other account first, and then i tried it on a different account because i didnt know what the problem was. give me my LP back please

replies.body: We aren't able to restore LP but I can help towards fixing the inherent issue.  It sounds like you're having an unstable connection issue which is causing you to lsoe sync in champion select.  You should go through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  Test it out in a custom to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!
1 more thing. Don't know if that would be the problem. I'm still on 7.3 patch. Nothing pop up and ask me for update when I log in. Is it 7.4  right now?

Even if your internet is fine, you can still have problems reaching specific servers so it's really important to go over that guide.  The new patch is not live buy you can bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay up to date on that.

my internet was fine. I had no problem playing other games. It only freezes during first ban  when the timer gets to 27 second. I shouldn't use the word disconnected. Because my game only froze and I couldn't exit out the game by pressing x and also when I turn league back on  I was logged in and inside a lobby with 6 minutes timer. I also tried it on other different accounts it is only when timer gets to 27 second my whole game freezes
